entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being spoken to by Aunt Marge. He is on his feet and defending himself against her accusations.

entities.name: vernon
entities.description: Vernon is the one who told Harry to go to bed, but Harry refused.

entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is yelling at Harry and accusing him of being an insolent, ungrateful little liar. She is described as having tiny bloodshot eyes and a great red face.

relationships.description: Vernon spoke to Harry, telling him to go to bed.
Aunt Marge yelled at Harry, accusing him of being an insolent, ungrateful little liar.
